name: Desperate Times
description: Use a variety of wonderful weaponry to annihilate literally thousands of enemy ships while dodging the unfathomable curtain of bullets they hurl in your direction. Defeat five epic bosses to claim your ultimate victory.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Not A Potato Memory: 50 MB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 20 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent Memory: 200 MB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 20 MB available space
